body: Thanks for the detailed report, I will have a look soon.

Very welcome, thanks for taking care.

I am pretty sure it will happens if you follow https://quarkus.io/guides/tests-with-coverage in a less elaborate setup than my project, so I agree there's a good chance of a bigger blast radius.

issue.title: Consider quarkus.test.arg-line as a string
issue.body:
We don't want to split it on commas but spaces so here is a quick fix for it.
We could write a specific converter but I'm not really sure it's worth it.

Fixes #45878

body: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/45888 might fix it but I will let @radcortez decide if it needs a more involved fix.
Thank you! I can confirm this fixes my build
Thanks for the confirmation. Glad we could catch this one before the official release!
